column4: i am listening to a radio station that needs a broadcast compressor
can i install a DSP plugin to compress the signal?
turn the volume down in alsamixer ?
but the thing is that i cant listen to this wituout a broadcast compander or something... is there a player with plugins in Ubuntu?
which audio player has a compressor plugin?
what i want is a player with a DSP compressor... like the threashold attack release gain...
